|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Manuf. by Foxconn / Hon Hai / Ambit, model U12H018 The same hardware [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=33975 appears to be used with the WGT624v2] (minus Flash and RAM changes). ==Links of Interest== [http://www.linux-hacker.net/cgi-bin/UltraBoard/UltraBoard.pl?Action=ShowPost&Board=RG&Post=5&Idle=0&Sort=0&Order On the linux-hacker.net forums] (high res board shot)
[http://www.seattlewireless.net/NetgearWGR614 On the Seattle Wireless wiki (WGR614 page)]
